feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 7 with temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low 7 with temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
